Reviews.Title: Absolutely love my L9
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Battle
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on phones before picking this one. I wanted an up to date android phone with a few bells and whistles. My tastes run along minimalist design and the L9 is right up my alley. The phone is responsive and plays games easily. The Android OS makes it a breeze to update and offers an endless amount of apps to really tap into the phones potential. My girlfriend has a Galaxy S4 and she plays games on my phone and can't tell the difference. The design is simple and sleek. The only flaw I can really find is that the chrome around the edge of the screen is a magnet for small scratches even with a case. Also, without a case the L9 is a lot lighter than many of the top end phones on the market. This may be seen as a plus or a negative to some, for me it makes it easy to forget its in my pocket. The traditional and front facing cameras are great and the phone has a nice LED flash as well. If you plan on purchasing the L9 be aware that there are two distinct models on the market place. The phone was launched overseas first and later brought to the states by T-Mobile. The overseas version has a bigger screen and the camera is placed in the top left corner of the back plate. The T-Mobile version comes with a smaller screen and the camera is in the middle of the back plate. I only note this because I found it difficult to find decent cases for my International version. This is in no way an indictment against the L9, just letting prospective owners know the heads up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone but
Reviews.Author: Andres
Reviews.Content: This phone is excellent, it has everything you need, its so fast that I wonder why you need more cores when this dual core phone can handle everything (i was chating on whatsapp listening to music donwloading from the play store and it is always snappy)The Camera is good, but in low ight conditions Not so Much But still it let you take really good pics. The only thing that worries me is The Battery...last night I Charged it to 100% and when i woke up It as 95% i Didnt have that with my htc one v...otherwise this is A fantastic phone highly recommended

Reviews.Title: LG Optimus L9 P768
Reviews.Author: Javontae Eaddy "Jay"
Reviews.Content: Good phone to have, works smoothly, crisp clear display, the camera is better than expected from other reviews, the panorama is awesome! The date and time setting is a little awkward in the states, being that the phone is from korea. But every thing else is excellent.

Reviews.Title: STOP Do not buy from this seller is a Scammer, read.
Reviews.Author: luz
Reviews.Content: You are offering the LG OPTIMUS L9 P768 UNLOCKED and you sent me the LG OPTIMUS L9 P769  T-Mobile. You're announcing or promoting a phone that you do not you send! you are a scammer! I tried to contact you via e-mail and tell me that you're on vacation when you refresh your page to increase the price of the phone to $ 256 when you buy it at $ 210 you are a scammer! because you do not answer me solve my problem and I lost my $ 410 phone that does not work because I legally proceed against AEG  WIRILESS if this does not answer me or solve my problem in the next few hours. I will not change the state before that.Really ask people to go to NO BUYING continue this product seller, help to stop these scams!. I'm doing all the relevant paperwork and this status will not change until I make my money back.

Reviews.Title: LG optimus L9 P768 Black
Reviews.Author: Jose Miguel Rodriguez D
Reviews.Content: Provides good performance and a good fluidity of the operating system LG Optimus P768 L9.Good web surfing, but this also depends on the mobile operator.Great connectivity of this handset includes Bluetooth version 3.0 with A2DP, WiFi 802.11 b / g / n NFC to make payments and allows connection to other terminals.Very light, does not weigh anything, mobile LG P768 Optimus L9 has 125 grams and is a very thin terminal with only 9.1 mm. Including the battery.8 MP camera FULL HD VIDEO WITH FLASH AND FUNCTION CHEESE. Excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone.
Reviews.Author: espinalgy
Reviews.Content: I've been using the phone for 3 weeks now and I love it. I am from The Dominican Republic, and it works  wonderfully over here. My internet works faster than on my old phone. We had to google how to turn on the DATA(3G), Because in my country this phone needs a APN, so we searched the APN and entered it on the phone and immediately the internet worked...This phone is so fast, I think that the dual core 1 GB RAM do wonders on this phone. The phone has great battery life, It lasts me all day and I am a heavy user. I am so happy with this phone. Just so you know the LG L9(P768) the camera has 8MP. Also The phone is very light and the screen size is perfect for me(I cant use those tiny phones anymore).The Phone I got came with English and Spanish options from the factory on the contrary to what some other people said.The only issue I'm finding, is that I can't delete more than one picture at a time Or I haven't figured out a way to do that as this was very simple to do on my previous droid.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price range

Reviews.Content: Nice buy on this product. Gifted this one to my in-law. he like this very much. Nice body built. Slim and seek. Great vivid display. LG is making stronger foot print in budget smartphones.

Reviews.Title: Battery life bad
Reviews.Author: Robert Lanzarotta
Reviews.Content: I use Consumer Cellular as my service.  They allow any unlocked phone and the Optimus L9 International fit the bill.  I liked the reviews so purchased one.  CC sent me their Sim card and set up the phone and card.  Basically every thing works ok but....First of all, Amazon's representative for this phone (AEG) did not send the International phone but a T-Mobil USA phone.  Had smaller screen (4.5 not 4.7) and less pixels on the camera.  I overlooked this and set the phone up.  Keeps getting a text msg error 122 which nobody has been able to help me clear (sends the text every 20 minutes).  The BIGGEST problem is the battery.  I can literally watch the percentage drop while not doing much of anything with the phone.  The screen resolution is great, speed is great.  This is a T-Mobil phone and even though it is unlocked it has a problem letting other carriers use the phone.  As far as the battery goes,  I deleted apps, turned on power saving etc. etc. but the battery is just not going to hold a charge for more than about 6 hours.  Optimus L9 is a discontinued phone according to the CC folks.  Nice phone (USA version) but be careful.
